properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord Thy Word abideth And our footsteps guideth Who its truth believeth Light and joy receiveth{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When our foes are near us Then Thy Word doth cheer us Word of consolation Message of salvation{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When the storms are o'er us And dark clouds before us Then its light directeth And our way protecteth{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who can tell the pleasure Who recount the treasure By Thy Word imparted To the simple-hearted{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Word of mercy giving Succour to the living Word of life supplying Comfort to the dying{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O that we discerning Its most holy learning Lord may love and fear Thee Evermore be near Thee{/lang-eng}
